001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model;
002
003import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
004import java.util.LinkedList;
005import java.util.List;
006
007/**
008 * Encapsulates data and logic regarding the {@link Game} object.
009 */
010public class Game {
011
012  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
013  private final String key;
014
015  @Expose
016  private final int boardSize;
017
018  @Expose
019  private final int playerCount;
020
021  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
022  private final List<Board> boards;
023
024  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
025  private final boolean started;
026
027  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
028  private final boolean finished;
029
030  @Expose(serialize = false, deserialize = true)
031  private final boolean yourTurn;
032
033  /**
034   * Initializes final fields in the absence of Gson initialization.
035   *
036   * @param key Unique {@code key} for the {@link Game} instance.
037   * @param boardSize Selected grid size that the game will be played on.
038   * @param playerCount Number of players in a game.
039   * @param boards {@link List} of every player's board.
040   * @param started Indicates whether game has started.
041   * @param finished Indicates whether game has finished.
042   * @param yourTurn Indicates whether it is the user's turn.
043   */
044  public Game(String key, int boardSize, int playerCount, List<Board> boards,  boolean started,
045      boolean finished, boolean yourTurn) {
046    this.key = key;
047    this.boardSize = boardSize;
048    this.playerCount = playerCount;
049    this.boards = boards;
050    this.started = started;
051    this.finished = finished;
052    this.yourTurn = yourTurn;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Constructs a game instance with the two parameters that the server requires to start a game.
057   *
058   * @param boardSize Selected grid size that the game will be played on.
059   * @param playerCount Number of players in a game.
060   */
061  public Game(int boardSize, int playerCount) {
062    this(null, boardSize, playerCount, new LinkedList<>(), false, false, false);
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Gets unique key for the {@link Game} instance.
067   */
068  public String getKey() {
069    return key;
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Gets the selected grid size that the game will be played on.
074   */
075  public int getBoardSize() {
076    return boardSize;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Gets the number of players in a game.
081   */
082  public int getPlayerCount() {
083    return playerCount;
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Gets the {@link List} of every player's board.
088   */
089  public List<Board> getBoards() {
090    return boards;
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Gets the boolean flag indicating whether a game has started.
095   */
096  public boolean isStarted() {
097    return started;
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Gets the boolean flag indicating whether a game has finished.
102   */
103  public boolean isFinished() {
104    return finished;
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Gets the boolean flag indicating whether it is the user's turn.
109   */
110  public boolean isYourTurn() {
111    return yourTurn;
112  }
113}
